author: bmwlego
title: Inexpensive Little Racer
review:
As stated in the Title, this is a cheap little racer. The minifig is a plus and the set is fun to put together. The printed "V" tile is a nice touch. Too bad there is nothing printed on the 1 x 4 white tile that is on the back of the racer. A black "v" pattern would have been cool. There is nothing rare about this set (besides the printed tile) so if you wanted to create a racing scene using variations of this model, it would be easy to accomplish. Another set from the 80's that survived my Dark Ages.

Please check out my brickshelf gallery:
http://www.brickshelf.com/cgi-bin/gallery.cgi?m=notenoughbricks

author: aplbomr
title: Little Racer
review: This was a nice racer set from back in the day.  Lego had put out a number of these.  They were a cheap stocking stuffer that my parents obviously saw some value in.  I can still easily find the parts and put it together in no time at all!
